type: Type of losgistics object, e.g. air waybill, booking, etc
typeCode: Commonly useed codes for document type, e.g. jfwb, jfhl etc. Leave nlank if unknown
issuedBy: Internet of logistics code of issuing party.
key: JSON field name of code that identifies this logistics object, e.g. 'waybill number', 'UPID' etc.

currency.BaseCurrency: Base or origin currency - ISO alpha 3 code
currency.TargetCurrency: Target or destination currency - ISO alpha 3 code
currency.ExchangeRateFor1BaseUnit: Amount of target currency for 1 unit of base currency - e.g. [amount in base currency] x [exchange rate] = [amount in target currency]
currency.ExchangeRateDate: Exchange rate date (or beginning or end of period)
